author: prbuzz.com
title: Sollek Announces Smartphone Accessories Brand
text:
For Immediate Release:
Sollek has launched, unveiling a new brand of smartphone accessories people can use to enhance their technological experience. These accessories include phone holders, screen protectors, and other products.
August 31, 2015 – Sollek has announced the launch of a new brand of smartphone accessories for 2015 focused on the goal of complete user satisfaction. It plans to introduce a series of high quality products people can use in their everyday lives. A blend of functionality and convenience is expected with each of these.
Innovative, yet simplistic, these products are intended to enable communication while in cars or otherwise on the move. A simple and convenient cell phone car mount is planned while a series of screen protectors and other products are in the works as well.
A representative of Sollek said, "We wanted to create accessories that were simple to use but also flexible. Through our simplistic innovations and our desire for excellence, we are striving to mobilize the way people communicate while on the go."
Phone holders planned for release will feature multiple mounting options. The smartphone industry is flooded with products millions of people use every day. With the new brand of accessories, these devices become even more usable in just about any setting.
Flexible products will now become available that expand the range of use of smart phones and other mobile devices. It is this goal of flexibility that drives the Sollek brand. People will find simple and affordable products that make their mobile devices more functional and suited for even more settings.
Sollek is launched complete with a highly functional and simple website. Visitors can view available products and learn more about the brand. The site is fully searchable and there’s also a contact form embedded right on the page so users can ask questions, provide comments, or give feedback on products.
To learn more about the Sollek brand and the smartphone accessories in its new product range, visit it online at http://www.sollek.com/ .
